archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0904
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer who is paying by invoice, when I have extra money, I want to be able to pay several months in advance, so that don;t have to worry about my bills for a while.

properties.value: EP: requirement clear BS: is not this requirement contradictory to another one where we force refunds in order to avoid money laundering? See: REQ_BSS_1113

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
